<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 75</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This beautiful leather bag is lined in soft fur and purrs quietly when pet.
